description: Bring the cafe to you with this smoked salmon and avocado toast recipe; perfect for breakfast, lunch or in between. Best of all, it's ready in 15 minutes.
name: Smoked Salmon & Smashed Avocado With Herb Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs fresh dill, 1 tbs chopped (1 tbs to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine Greek-style yoghurt, horseradish, dill, parsley and 1 tsp of finely grated lemon rind. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Set aside.
Peel and deseed the avocado. Scoop the flesh into a bowl. Add juice from half the lemon. Use a fork to roughly mash. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cut remaining lemon half into wedges.
Generously spread smashed avocado on toasted sourdough, then spoon over the yoghurt mixture and top with the salmon. Garnish with extra dill sprigs and serve immediately with lemon wedges.
